scripts.deploy:dev: cd app && npm run build && rm -rf ../approuter/build && cp -r build ../approuter/build && cd .. && cp xs-security-dev.json xs-security.json && cp approuter/xs-app-dev.json approuter/xs-app.json && mbt build -t mta_archives && cf deploy mta_archives/invoicing-capm_1.0.0.mtar -f
scripts.deploy:qa: cf target -o "Merit_Polymers Pvt Ltd._MeritPolymersSubdomain1" -s QUALITY && cd app && npm run build && rm -rf ../approuter/build && cp -r build ../approuter/build && cd .. && cp xs-security-quality.json xs-security.json && cp approuter/xs-app-quality.json approuter/xs-app.json && mbt build -t mta_archives && cf deploy mta_archives/invoicing-capm_1.0.0.mtar -f
scripts.deploy:prd: cf target -o "Merit_Polymers Pvt Ltd._MeritPolymersSubdomain1" -s PRODUCTION && cd app && npm run build && rm -rf ../approuter/build && cp -r build ../approuter/build && cd .. && cp xs-security-prod.json xs-security.json && cp approuter/xs-app-production.json approuter/xs-app.json && mbt build -t mta_archives && cf deploy mta_archives/invoicing-capm_1.0.0.mtar -f
